execution_plan.description: Retrieve shipped order_item IDs with their shipment tracking numbers from the shipments database (only shipment_items that have a matching shipment).
execution_plan.query: SELECT shipment_items.order_item_id AS s1__order_item_id, shipments.shipment_tracking_number AS s1__shipment_tracking_number FROM shipment_items INNER JOIN shipments ON shipment_items.shipment_id = shipments.shipment_id;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve order item status codes from the orders database for order items (to be joined with shipped items).
execution_plan.query: SELECT Order_Items.order_item_id AS s2__order_item_id, Order_Items.order_item_status_code AS s2__order_item_status_code FROM Order_Items;
